item.title: Carrie and Lowell
item.description: Carrie & Lowell by Sufjan Stevens One of my favorite albums of recent years. Thanks to Spotify auto play, I was fortunate enough to hear one of the songs from the album, Fourth of July. I didn’t pay much attention to it at first, but then there is a verse, “We’re all gonna die…”, just keeps on continuously, unstoppably playing in my head. It wasn’t the annoying kind of songs that got stuck in your head (Don’t think about Baby).
